IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.create_guild') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.create_guild GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.create_guild @id dbo.id_t, @guild_name NVARCHAR(15), @guild_mark_code dbo.code_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Guilds(id, guild_name, guild_mark_code) VALUES(@id, @guild_name, @guild_mark_code)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
